document_data.name: ''Wand of Entanglement''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of entanglement''''' were [[enchanted]] [[wand]]s that allowed the wielder to cast the ''[[entangle]]'' spell.
document_data.Description: These wands were created using vines that remained alive, growing out of the rod base.
document_data.Powers: The wielder could produce ''entangle'' spells at will. Each wand possessed as few as four After the [[Second Sundering]], ''wands of entanglement'' with only seven charges were more common. These wands regenerated charges each dawn and could disintegrate into dust when exhausted.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], several of these wands were unearthed in the deep [[Elven Catacombs]] of [[Myth Drannor]], during the city's occupation by the forces of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
